original_text: For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication, and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her, and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the abundance of her delicacies.
korean_text: 그 음행의 진노의 포도주로 말미암아 만국이 무너졌으며 또 땅의 왕들이 그와 더불어 음행하였으며 땅의 상인들도 그 사치의 세력으로 치부하였도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: of the wine of the wrath of her fornication
and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her
and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 상인들이 그녀의 진귀한 물품으로 부하게 되었도다

sentences.original_text: through the abundance of her delicacies
